subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Howie Garfinkel’s binders are meticulously kept despite their age and odor, and together they constitute a kind of informal biography of an 83-year-old obsessive basketball enthusiast. Here are some excerpts.
snippet: Howie Garfinkel’s binders are meticulously kept despite their age and odor, and together they constitute a kind of informal biography of an 83-year-old obsessive basketball enthusiast. Here are some excerpts.
